正: (sei/shou/tada/masa) - correct , (logical) true, regular; 10^40, ten thousand undecillion; positive, greater than zero
正々: (せいせい) - accurate; exact; punctual; neat
正々堂々: (せいせいどうどう) - (yoji) fair and square; open and aboveboard
正しい: (tadashii) - certo, correto; adequado, justo, honesto, verdadeiro, legal
正しい行い: (ただしいおこない) - right conduct
正しい言葉を使う: (ただしいことばをつかう) - to use the correct word
正しい言葉を遣う: (ただしいことばをつかう) - to use the correct word
正しく: (まさしく) - surely; no doubt; evidently
正す: (ただす) - to correct/to reform/to amend/to redress; to adjust/to straighten; to ascertain/to confirm/to verify/to make sure of; to enquire of someone about something (inquire)/to question
正と続: (せいとぞく) - first and second series
正に: (まさに) - (esp. 正に) exactly/surely/certainly; (esp. 将に) just (about to)/on the verge (of doing or happening); (esp. 当に) duly/naturally
正の外部性: (せいのがいぶせい) - positive externalities
正の数: (せいのすう) - positive number; positive value
正・写し受信者表示: (せい・うつしじゅしんしゃひょうじ) - primary and copy recipients indication
正一位: (しょういちい) - first rank in the hierarchy of the government; highest rank given to a shrine
正丁: (しょうてい) - man in good health between 21 and 60 years of age to whom applied various corvee and taxes (under the ritsuryo system)
正三位: (しょうさんみ) - senior grade of the third court rank
正三角すい: (せいさんかくすい) - triangular pyramid with equilateral base
正三角形: (せいさんかっけい) - equilateral triangle; regular triangle
正三角錐: (せいさんかくすい) - triangular pyramid with equilateral base
正五角形: (せいごかくけい) - regular pentagon; equilateral pentagon
正位置: (せいいち) - regular position (e.g. in sports team)/normal position; revealing a card in the upright position (tarot, etc.)
正体: (しょうたい) - natural shape/one's true colors/one's true colours/true character/identity/true identity; consciousness/one's senses
正体不明: (しょうたいふめい) - (yoji) unidentifiable; unidentified
正倉: (しょうそう) - public storehouse used to store grain or valuables collected for taxation (ritsuryo system)
正先: (しょうさき) - (From 正面先)  downstage center (noh)
正八面体: (せいはちめんたい) - regular octahedron
正六面体: (せいろくめんたい) - regular hexahedron; cube
正兵: (せいへい) - (ant: 奇兵) regular soldiers
正典: (せいてん) - canon (i.e. the Biblical canon)
正典化: (せいてんか) - canonization (in a textual sense)
正円窓: (せいえんそう) - fenestra rotunda (of the ear)
正写: (せいしゃ) - certification that document copies are correct
正写し受信者表示: (せいうつしじゅしんしゃひょうじ) - primary and copy recipients indication
正則: (せいそく) - correct; proper; formal; regular; systematic; normal
正則曲線: (せいそくきょくせん) - regular curve
正則行列: (せいそくぎょうれつ) - regular matrix
正則表現: (せいそくひょうげん) - regular expression
正則関数: (せいそくかんすう) - holomorphic function
正副: (せいふく) - original and copy; chief and vice-chief
正副二通: (せいふくにつう) - original and duplicate
正副議長: (せいふくぎちょう) - chairman and vice-chairman
正反対: (せいはんたい) - bipolar; polar; polarity; exactly opposite
正号: (せいごう) - plus sign (+); positive sign
正味重量: (しょうみじゅうりょう) - net weight
正員: (せいいん) - member; regular member; active member
正坐: (せいざ) - seiza; kneeling with the tops of the feet flat on the floor, and sitting on the soles
正報: (しょうほう) - direct retribution; body and mind one is born into because of karma in previous lives
正夢: (まさゆめ) - dream that comes true
正妻: (せいさい) - legal wife/lawful wife; first wife (in polygamous relationship)
正嫡: (せいてき) - legal wife; her child; main family
正字: (せいじ) - correct characters/correctly written kanji; traditional characters/traditional kanji
正安息香酸: (せいあんそくこうさん) - orthobenzoic acid
正宗: (まさむね) - famous sword/sword blade by Masamune; sake/Japanese rice wine/brand of sake from Nada region during Tempo era (1830-1844)
正定業: (しょうじょうごう) - correct meditative activity (in Jodo, saying the name of Amitabha)
正客: (せいかく) - guest of honor; guest of honour
正室: (せいしつ) - legal wife (of a noble) (as opposed to a concubine); room for receiving guests; heir/successor
正対: (せいたい) - confronting directly; meeting face-to-face
正常: (せいじょう) - (ant: 異常) normalcy; normality; normal
